items.content_html: Javascript/WebGL lightweight face tracking library designed for augmented reality webcam filters. Features : multiple faces detection, rotation, mouth opening. Various integration examples are provided (Three.js, Babylon.js, FaceSwap, Canvas2D, CSS3D...).

items.content_html: TitleCaseMaster is a lightweight JavaScript utility library designed to simplify the task of converting input names into a consistent sentence case format. It takes into account various scenarios and ensures proper capitalization for names, making it perfect for applications where accurate naming conventions are crucial.
